configure.name: MAVLINK_PORT
configure.description: The port device to use for mavlink (default: UART1)

configure.name: MAVLINK_BAUD
configure.description: Baud rate if MAVLINK_PORT is a UART

makefile.raw: MAVLINK_PORT ?= UART1 MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER=$(shell echo $(MAVLINK_PORT) | tr a-z A-Z) MAVLINK_PORT_LOWER=$(shell echo $(MAVLINK_PORT) | tr A-Z a-z) ifneq (,$(findstring usb,$(MAVLINK_PORT_LOWER))) ap.CFLAGS += -DUSE_USB_SERIAL ap.srcs += $(SRC_ARCH)/usb_ser_hw.c ap.CFLAGS += -DMAVLINK_DEV=usb_serial else ifneq (,$(findstring udp,$(MAVLINK_PORT_LOWER))) include $(CFG_SHARED)/udp.makefile $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DMAVLINK_DEV=$(MAVLINK_PORT_LOWER) $(TARGET).CFLAGS += -DUSE_$(MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER) else ifneq (,$(findstring bluegiga,$(MAVLINK_PORT_LOWER))) ap.CFLAGS += -DUSE_BLUEGIGA BLUEGIGA_SPI_DEV ?= SPI2 BLUEGIGA_SPI_DEV_LOWER=$(shell echo $(BLUEGIGA_SPI_DEV) | tr A-Z a-z) ap.CFLAGS += -DUSE_$(BLUEGIGA_SPI_DEV)_SLAVE -DSPI_SLAVE -DBLUEGIGA_SPI_DEV=$(BLUEGIGA_SPI_DEV_LOWER) ap.CFLAGS += -DMAVLINK_DEV=bluegiga_p ap.srcs += $(SRC_SUBSYSTEMS)/datalink/bluegiga.c # LED MODEM_LED ?= none ifneq ($(MODEM_LED),none) ap.CFLAGS += -DMODEM_LED=$(MODEM_LED) endif else MAVLINK_BAUD ?= B57600 ap.CFLAGS += -DMAVLINK_DEV=$(MAVLINK_PORT_LOWER) ap.CFLAGS += -DUSE_$(MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER) ap.CFLAGS += -D$(MAVLINK_PORT_UPPER)_BAUD=$(MAVLINK_BAUD) endif endif endif
